examples: And although, as someone recently said to me, they are not "designer" (she had expected my pussies to be expensive, with a pedigree), to me my cats are the most beautiful in the world.

entries.meaning: (vulgar, slang) The female genitalia; the vulva and/or vagina. [from 17th c.]
Anything soft and furry; a bloom form, or catkin, as on the pussy willow. [from 19th c.]
(vulgar, slang, uncountable, normally in the phrase "to get some pussy") Sexual intercourse with a woman. [from 20th c.]
examples: I’m gonna get me some pussy tonight.

entries.meaning: (derogatory, vulgar, slang) A coward; a weakling; an ineffectual, timid, or pathetic person. [from 20th c.]
(colloquial, endearing, now rare) A woman or girl, seen as having characteristics associated with cats such as sweetness. [from 16th c.]
examples: If Lloyd George’s endearments to mistress Frances Stevenson – “My darling Pussy. You might phone… on Friday if you can come. Don’t let Hankey see you” – had been made similarly public, would he have maintained his own reputation as a towering statesman?

entries.meaning: (vulgar, gay slang) The anus of a man, usually the passive participant in gay sex.
(vulgar, humorous, Internet slang) Used in blends to form deliberately grotesque and unwieldy words referring to cavities. See  -ussy on  Wikipedia.Wikipedia .

(vulgar, humorous, Internet slang) A notional part of the body used during exertion of effort; usually in the form put one's whole pussy into. Also used in blends to form deliberately grotesque and unwieldy words referring to this. See  -ussy on  Wikipedia.Wikipedia .

adjectives.description: pussy (comparative more pussy, superlative most pussy)
